Research Interests & Collaboration

I am particularly interested in:

  • PhD Opportunities in 3D Computer Vision and Generative AI
  • Research Collaborations on full-body pose estimation, 3D reconstruction, and generative models
  • Applications of AI/ML in developing regions, especially in Africa
  • Workshop/Conference Participation and speaking opportunities
